start_room.name: DUNGEON ENTRANCE
start_room.base_description:
You stand alone in a dark damp basement. In the wall before you there is a gaping fissure large enough to squeeze through
. To the west there is a door.

objects.table: An old workbench covered in dust. No one's been here in years.

lamp_present.description_modifier: An old lamp sits on the workbench, casting flickering shadows on the walls.

first_visit.description_modifier: The air feels stale, as if no one has been here in ages.

armory.name: ARMORY
armory.base_description: An empty pedestal sits across the room. Various weapons line the walls, dull and rusted from lack of use.

lamp_present.description_modifier: However, there is one sword among them that may yet prove of use.

lamp.name: lamp
lamp.description: An old storm lantern bearing the stamp of 'Cloman Co-makers of reliable products'.

sword.name: sword
sword.description: An old sword. Beneath layers of dust, the blade still looks sharp enough to cut. Handle with care.
